messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-openpose-editor?
The ComfyUI-openpose-editor is a custom node in ComfyUI that allows users to edit poses estimated by the pose estimator node.
What is the prerequisite for using ComfyUI-openpose-editor?
To use ComfyUI-openpose-editor, you need to have the comfyui_controlnet_aux installed from https://github.com/Fannovel16/comfyui_controlnet_aux.
How do you obtain the POSE_KEYPOINT JSON in ComfyUI-openpose-editor?
To obtain the POSE_KEYPOINT JSON, you need to use the pose estimator node in ComfyUI.
What is the purpose of the Load Openpose JSON node in ComfyUI-openpose-editor?
The Load Openpose JSON node is used to load the POSE_KEYPOINT JSON obtained from the pose estimator node.
What can you do after loading the POSE_KEYPOINT JSON in ComfyUI-openpose-editor?
After loading the POSE_KEYPOINT JSON, you can perform necessary edits to the pose using the ComfyUI-openpose-editor.
How do you send the edited pose back to ComfyUI from ComfyUI-openpose-editor?
To send the edited pose back to ComfyUI, you need to click the Send pose to ControlNet button in the ComfyUI-openpose-editor modal.
What happens when you click the Send pose to ControlNet button in ComfyUI-openpose-editor?
When you click the Send pose to ControlNet button, the edited pose is sent back to ComfyUI and the ComfyUI-openpose-editor modal is closed.
